0.1.name: wordpress/croice
0.1.description: Bloggers are always looking for new ways to attract and retain audiences. Croice solves this problem through advanced interactive sharing. You create your own radio channel and share your personal widget through social networks, your blog, or virtually any other web site. The widget is used to announce broadcasts and communicate with the audience. The widget automatically updates the audience of the upcoming broadcasts. When there is time, you start broadcasting, and all the widgets go live. Listeners can listen to, comment, and call up the broadcaster live. You can use it for webinars too. All you need is attach Slideshare presentation link and slide will attach and synchronized with your listeners widget.
